meanings.definition: A shop or bakery specializing in pastries and sweets.
meanings.sent1: I visited the patisserie to buy some delicious pastries.
meanings.sent2: The patisserie on the corner always has a tempting display of sweets.
meanings.sent3: The patisserie had so many treats, I couldn't decide what to choose!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a patisserie, sweet and inviting.
meanings.sent5: The aroma from the patisserie filled the street with a mouth-watering scent.

meanings.definition: The art or skill of making pastries and desserts.
meanings.sent1: She learned the art of patisserie from her grandmother.
meanings.sent2: His passion for patisserie led him to become a pastry chef.
meanings.sent3: Her patisserie skills were so good, she could make any dessert look like a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The patisserie of her hands turned simple ingredients into delectable treats.
meanings.sent5: The patisserie of flavors in her desserts delighted everyone who tasted them.
